reviewText: and foods that are labeled and VERIFIED as NON-GMO.I was so mad after watching this movie. Knowing that I have, no doubt, fed this garbage to my family over the years WITHOUT having the CHOICE to NOT do so, angers me beyond belief. We have slowly been moving toward a plant-based, whole foods diet and now it's a done deal - 100%. From this day forward we eat nothing but organic or non-GMO verified foods. I knew about GMO foods, but I did not know how pervasive they are in our food supply. They are, literally, EVERYWHERE - hidden in processed food, without our knowledge.We all must stop buying this poison because it's the only way to stop them from continuing this science experiment on our bodies. The thing that angered me the most in this movie - soy baby formula being made with GMO products (because MOST U.S. soy is GMO)! They are using babies for their SICK and DEMENTED biology experiment! BABIES! Babies who are allergic to milk (probably caused by the disgusting growth hormones injected into the cows to make them produce more milk) have to drink soy based formula and 4 of the Major formula companies use GMO products to make it??? Are you kidding me? It's outrageous. Autism is likely linked to these GMO foods also.I printed out the Non-GMO shopping guide and the Non-GMO VERIFIED companies list on Genetic Roulette's web site and EVERYONE should do the same if you want to avoid these frightening foods. Just Google the movie name and you will find the shopping guide on their site. We need to support the companies that refuse to use GMO prducts. I know I'm going to.Do yourself and your family a favor and watch this movie. You will never look at food the same way again.
summary: I am now officially eating ONLY organic foods
Title: N/A

reviewText: Already a statistic myself due to food allergies and a raft of GI problems, this video (and no doubt the book) is a must have in everyone's library. If you are uninformed about the realities of GMO foods and the alteration of our food system (particularly here in the U.S.) - then you must see this and get up to speed.  Unless there is governmental intervention on the side of the public's welfare (and so far there has not been much - so little in fact in my opinion it has been "useless") - we are being drastically harmed in terms of our health and aging processes. And what about our children/grandchildren? Great great piece of work - well edited. IMHO it could have been longer. The primary film comes with a 2nd film in the box - "Seeds" narrated by Jeremy Irons -- about the seed business and what is happening there. Critical knowledge and my thanks to those who managed to get this into the marketplace and I hope that it is not somehow "disappeared".
summary: Genetic Roulette: The Gamble of Our LIves

reviewText: Very well researched and presented facts concerning the health risks associated with ingesting GMOs. We have been avoiding them for several years, but now I have a clearer understanding of why we MUST avoid them!  Our DVD has already gotten lots of viewings from family and friends, and the message has been very gratefully received. My sincere thanks goes to those who did the work of putting this message out on DVD. We're eagerly awaiting the day when labeling of GMO foods goes into effect, and then, when the swell grows strong enough, that GMOs are banished!

reviewText: I got a chance to see this video for free and still bought it because I wanted to lend it to others to see. We've all heard a little bit about genetically modified foods and I thought the issue had more or less been taken care of. I couldn't have been more wrong. These crops need to go and our politicians will never have the will power but we have the power of the almighty dollar to stop it by not buying the stuff. I get a voice in how the world's and my own food is produced because every dollar I spent is a vote for what I want to see. Of course the worst affected are those unable to make decisions for themselves the children. Immoral and unethical are words too good for the multinationals that produce this garbage that they call food and feed for animals. This is something that everyone who eats needs to see. I cannot stress enough that everyone who is reading this review has already consumed genetically altered foods and so have their loved ones. I am not an alarmist by nature, but this is really information that every person should know and take a stand on. Your health and that of your family's is being taken away from you without you being aware and in the name of companies making billions. Is your health and the health of you family worth the hour to watch this video? I guarantee that it is not wasted time.
summary: Must See if you eat food!!

reviewText: I recommend this movie to everyone.  The perversions that are being done to not only our sacred 'food', but also to our planets animals.  These are horrors of horrors being done to all life on the planet.  For instance: spider DNA mixed in a goats DNA so the milk of the goat can be spun into 'spider silk' for bullet proof jackets? What? or now there is rumor of scorpion poison added to cabbage DNA?Another very disturbing problem is these corporations like Monsanto are patenting these 'vegtable' seeds, adding terminator genes so the seeds MUST BE PURCHASED EVERY YEAR! Not how nature intended to give us food for the future in our food today with seeds.These corporations want to take total control over all food, vegetation...and they won't stop there.This a a very good movie, not only does it tell you details about the GMO, genetically modified organisms (our food) but also great news that the damage is reversible.We have to stop this total corruption and takeover of our agriculture, nature and our planet.  Please watch and share this movie with everyone!

reviewText: This movie is a well directed study of the variety of ways the chemical companies are exploiting farmers and consumers by making promises that don't deliver and in actuality are leading to new diseases that are increasing at alarming rates and in some cases end up in killing livestock and people that consume their product.  It is appalling to see how this is decimating our health, our soils, our children, livestock and our future!However, besides revealing the insidious greed that overshadows any impact their lies may have perpetrated, there is a positive side.  We consumers still can vote with our money!  Yes, organic is often more expensive but the flip side is that it is more beneficial to our health.  Wouldn't you rather stop taking pills to "medicate" a problem (not heal it) and instead heal or at least lessen a condition caused by the harmful after effects?  I am not a doctor so I will encourage you to watch Medical Doctors on this film state how they have had incredible success treating patients through an organic diet.  It is cheaper to be healthy than spending money on bad food and then take pills (which also have side effects).The film also highlighted those companies, who are committed to being organic are voluntary submitting to 3rd party companies for review and specific approval - similar to the "Good Housekeeping Seal".  One of these is the "Non GMO Project Verified".  I encourage those who want to learn more about how our food is making us sick and some even to the point of death and why our government and a few others (Europe won't allow many food products from U.S. to be imported) do nothing.Genetic Roulette: The Gamble of our Lives -there is also a site online to get shopping guides of safe foods, vitamins and other important products.  I also liked "Fresh" and "The Whole Truth about Milk: raw vs pasteurized".  The more that you learn, the more you realize that it is always about money.While the information may be a bit overwhelming (you would probably benefit from reviewing several times a year to synthesize all the info.), it is a terrific resource.Consumers are unfortunately going to have to do the work to better informed so they can keep safe.

reviewText: This is a huge wake-up call to how our "food" is made and what is in it. I know there is skepticism on the actual damages that GMO's cause, but there is no denying that plants were doing just fine without bioengineering. They say they want to feed the world with GMO's and it will stop world hunger, but GMO's have been around since 1996 and there is still world hunger. It all boils down to how food is distributed. I've completely cut out all processed foods, including meat and dairy and I've lost 35lbs in 3 months. It wasn't easy because GMO's are in everything. But there are food companies out there who do label there foods and take pride in using non-GMO ingredients. This movie really helped me make the right decisions about what I put in my body. And besides if GMO's aren't so bad why can't they just label them? That's all we want. We're not asking them to stop making them, just label them. Simple as that. This movie is a huge eye-opener. Must watch!

reviewText: I will try to keep my personal opinions out of this.  I will say:  Every American should be required to watch Genetic Roulette!  If we, as a people, don't start saying no to the horror that is being peddled to us disguised as "food" we are going to be in huge trouble.  Before you become angry at me for saying that... please do some research on what is in our food.  Just take one hour and check it out (Especially fast food!!).  Ask yourself why 50% of the food products made in the U.S. are *banned* in every other country on Earth.  Watch this film please... and then vote against rotten unhealthy "frankenfood" with your hard earned dollars by refusing to buy these God Awful products on the shelves of almost every store in the U.S. Look for alternatives from companies that choose to do things the healthy way and are not trying to play God with the Earth's ecosystem.

reviewText: We are all part of a giant experiment. It almost feels like a fictional Roald Dahl Movie. I never even knew the corn and soy I was eating back in late 90s was genetically modified. The movie is a must see for all people in USA. While rest of world has made mandatory to label or ban GMO foods, it is still not necessary to so in USA. Basically people are not even aware of this for most part. Even states like California rejected the ballot measure. I really wonder how people can say, I don't care what I put in my stomach as long as it is sweet and salty. If you go plant based diet, you can avoid GMO to a large extent. If you go 100% organic, you can avoid GMOs. I read yesterday WHO said cancer % have shot up in past 20 years. GMOs were introduced 20 years ago. Anybody will see a connection. I applaud the movie producers and director for taking this excellent movie and starting to create a grass root awareness.The movie is scary, but absolute reality. Let us all eat healthy, food as available in nature.

reviewText: Jeffrey Smith just released an incredible new documentary called Genetic Roulette: The Gamble of Our Lives.  It's narrated by Lisa Oz (daughter of Dr. Oz) and features interviews with physicians, scientists, farmers, dieticians, chefs and educators all discussing the problems with genetically engineered foods.Americans get sick more often then Europeans and people in other industrial countries and we're getting sicker.  Since the mid 1990's when Genetically Modified Organisms (Genetically Engineered Foods) when our food supply was taken over, without our knowledge or our consent.  The number of Americans suffering at least three chronic illnesses nearly doubled.  Why is this taking place?We've had an epidemic increase in cancer, obesity, allergies, autism, diabetes, asthma, and intestinal disorders.  These are the same conditions that animals eating genetically engineered foods develop in the lab.  It seems like we, and our children, are the guinea pigs of the biotech industry. And contrary to what `industry' states, there are NO long-term safety studies.Genetic Roulette covers everything from the basics, What is a GMO? How are GMOs made? It also has a number of sections on the possible connection of GMOs to Allergies, Autism, Intestinal Damage and Birth Defects.There's also a great section on the California Ballot Initiative - Yes on Prop 37 -that with the support of millions of Californians, will hopefully win in November.There's a second bonus disk with three other short documentaries: Seeds of Freedom (narrated by Jeremy Irons), The Documented Health Risks of Genetically Engineered Foods, The Politics of GMOs and 12 short Public Service announcements.If you eat food this is a must see movie. Share it with everyone you know and lets get GMOs out of our food supply.  Highly Recommended!Review from Moms for Safe Food

reviewText: I was literally eating some edamame for a snack when the narrator (Dr. Oz's wife, Lisa) said that 90 percent of the soy grown in America is genetically modified. I had six bags left in my freezer, but after seeing the results of GMO treated food I threw them away.Monsanto is made out to be the devil incarnate. That may be true, or not. As usual, there are activists on one side and pesticide lobbyists on the other each waving studies around every which way. What I do know is that Americans should know what's in their food. GMO-treated or not? Currently, that bit of information is not required on packaging.
summary: Well I both love it and hate it at the same time
